entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 02:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: ENE 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
